::FireStrike::
The shot from Megatron caught FireStrike in the blind side blowing 
him to the ground and sending him skidding for a few hundred feet.  
As he finally stopped dust filled all around him.  But out of the 
dust walked, or limped a smoking FireStrike, staring into the evil 
depths of Megatrons eyes. "I have seen enough.  You and your evil to 
your own team will prove to be your death, and I am the reaper."
FireStrike stated. The reprogramation that SwitchBlade had done had 
all been deleted by the fusion power zapping him.  He was now once 
again FireBlade, but with his FireStrike body. "You treat us like 
your junkyard dogs. Well Megatron, prepare to become nothing but a 
part of the Pit." he stated loudly firing a rocket from his sword 
back at Megatron.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> ::FireStrike::
> FireStrike brought the flat side of his sword against his body 
> blocking the shots.  He then pointed the blade straight at Unitron. 
> The blade opened and a rocket came flying out. On impact the rocket 
> would explode in heat enough to melt some body parts.  
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> > Unitron:
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > "Brave words," Unitron said as he leapt back from Nightstrike's 
> slashes, 
> > firing off ten two blasts from his rifle at him.  He ducked down 
to 
> narrowly 
> > avoid Megatron's blast, and fired ten rapid optic blasts at the 
> incoming 
> > Decepticon leader, digging his feet into the ground in case of 
> impact.
